word:
I never labored in my life more directly under the controlling influences of the Spirit of God. God gave me meat in due season for the people, 


                                   -14- 

but they refused it, for it did not come in just the way and manner they wanted it to come. Elders Jones and Waggoner presented precious light to the people, but prejudice and unbelief, jealousy and evil-surmising, barred the door of their hearts that nothing from this source should find entrance to their hearts.
